trans-unit.source: Exploring the Windows PowerShell ISE
Exploring the Windows PowerShell ISE
You can use the [!INCLUDE[ise_1](../Token/ise_1_md.md)] to create, run, and debug commands and scripts.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [!INCLUDE[ise_1](../Token/ise_1_md.md)] 建立、執行及偵錯命令和指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] consists of the menu bar, Windows PowerShell tabs, the toolbar, script tabs, a Script Pane, a Console Pane, a status bar, a text\-size slider and context\-sensitive Help.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 是由功能表列、Windows PowerShell 索引標籤、工具列、指令碼索引標籤、指令碼窗格、主控台窗格、狀態列、文字大小滑桿和即時線上說明所組成。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 3.0 the Command and Output Panes were combined into a single Console Pane.
trans-unit.target: 從 [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 3.0 開始，命令窗格和輸出窗格已合併為單一主控台窗格。

trans-unit.source: Menu Bar
The menu bar contains the **File**, **Edit**, **View**, **Tools**, **Debug**, **Add\-ons**, and **Help** menus.
The buttons on the menus allow you to perform tasks related to writing and running scripts and running commands in the [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 功能表上的按鈕可讓您在 [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 中執行與寫入和執行指令碼，以及執行命令相關的工作。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, an [Add-ons menu](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/412dd662-417a-4661-ada2-558802d0f6d2#submenus) may be placed on the menu bar by running scripts that use the [Windows PowerShell ISE Scripting Object Model](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1737ddb7-c20d-4e6b-a0d3-68cc2650f2a1).
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以執行使用 [Windows PowerShell ISE 指令碼物件模型](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1737ddb7-c20d-4e6b-a0d3-68cc2650f2a1)的指令碼，將 [[附加元件] 功能表](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/412dd662-417a-4661-ada2-558802d0f6d2#submenus)放在功能表列上。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 2.0, The **Tools** and **Add\-ons** menus were not present.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 2.0 中，不提供 **[工具]** 和 **[附加元件]** 功能表。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Tabs
A Windows PowerShell tab is the environment in which a Windows PowerShell script runs.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 索引標籤是 Windows PowerShell 指令碼的執行環境。

trans-unit.source: You can open new Windows PowerShell tabs in the [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] to create separate environments on your local computer or on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 中開啟新的 Windows PowerShell 索引標籤，以在您的本機電腦或遠端電腦上建立個別環境。

trans-unit.source: You may have a maximum of eight PowerShell tabs simultaneously open.
trans-unit.target: 您最多可以同時開啟 8 個 PowerShell 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: Toolbar
The following buttons are located on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在工具列上找到下列按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Button
Function
New
Opens a new script.
Open
Opens an existing script or file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟現有的指令碼或檔案。

trans-unit.source: Save
Saves a script or file.
Cut
Cuts the selected text and copies it to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 剪下選取的文字並複製到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Copy
Copies the selected text to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將選取文字複製到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Paste
Pastes the contents of the clipboard at the cursor location.
trans-unit.target: 在游標位置貼上剪貼簿的內容。

trans-unit.source: Clear Output Pane
Clears all content in the Output Pane.
trans-unit.target: 清除輸出窗格中的所有內容。

trans-unit.source: Undo
Reverses the action that was just performed.
Redo
Performs the action that was just undone.
Run Script
Runs a script.
Run Selction
Runs a selected portion of a script.
trans-unit.target: 執行選取的指令碼部分。

trans-unit.source: Stop Execution
Stops a script that is running.
New Remote PowerShell Tab
trans-unit.target: 新增遠端 PowerShell 索引標籤

trans-unit.source: Creates a new PowerShell Tab that establishes a session on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 PowerShell 索引標籤，以在遠端電腦上建立工作階段。

trans-unit.source: A dialog box appears and prompts you to enter details required to establish the remote connection.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊隨即出現，並提示您輸入建立遠端連線所需的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Start PowerShell.exe
Opens a PowerShell Console.
Show Script Pane Top
Moves the Script Pane to the top in the display.
trans-unit.target: 將指令碼窗格移至顯示畫面上方。

trans-unit.source: Show Script Pane Right
Moves the Script Pane to the right in the display.
trans-unit.target: 將指令碼窗格移至顯示畫面右側。

trans-unit.source: Show Script Pane Maximized
trans-unit.target: 顯示最大化的指令碼窗格

trans-unit.source: Maximizes the Script Pane.
Script Tab
Displays the name of the script you are editing.
trans-unit.target: 顯示您正在編輯的指令碼名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can click a script tab to select the script you want to edit.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下指令碼索引標籤，選取要編輯的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: When you point to the script tab, the fully qualified path to the script file appears in a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 當您指向指令碼索引標籤時，指令碼檔案的完整路徑會顯示在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: Script Pane
Allows you to create and run scripts.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您建立及執行指令碼。

trans-unit.source: You can open, edit and run existing scripts in the Script Pane.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在指令碼窗格中開啟、編輯及執行現有的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Output Pane
Displays the results of the commands and scripts you have run.
trans-unit.target: 顯示已執行的命令和指令碼結果。

trans-unit.source: You can also copy and clear the contents in the Output Pane.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以複製並清除輸出窗格中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Command Pane
Allows you to write commands.
You can run a one line command or a multiline command in the Command Pane.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在命令窗格中執行一或多行命令。

trans-unit.source: Press SHIFT\+ENTER to enter each line of a multiline command, and press ENTER after the last line to execute the multiline command.
trans-unit.target: 按 SHIFT+ENTER 可輸入多行命令的每一行，而在最後一行後面按 ENTER 鍵可執行多行命令。

trans-unit.source: The prompt displayed on top of the Command Pane shows the path to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 出現在命令窗格頂端的提示會顯示目前工作目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Status Bar
Allows you to see whether the commands and scripts that you run are complete.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您查看所執行的命令和指令碼是否已完成。

trans-unit.source: The status bar is at the very bottom of the display.
trans-unit.target: 狀態列位於顯示畫面最底部。

trans-unit.source: Selected portions of error messages are displayed on the status bar.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息的選定部分會顯示在狀態列上。

trans-unit.source: Text\-Size Slider
Increases or decreases the size of the text on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 增加或減少螢幕上文字的大小。

trans-unit.source: Help
Help for [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] is available on the Web in the TechNet Library.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 TechNet Library 網站上取得 [!INCLUDE[ise_2](../Token/ise_2_md.md)] 的說明。

trans-unit.source: You can open the Help by clicking **Windows PowerShell ISE Help** on the **Help** menu or by pressing the F1 key anywhere except when the cursor is on a cmdlet name in either the Script Pane or the Console Pane.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 [說明] 的方式是在 **[說明]** 功能表上按一下 **[Windows PowerShell ISE 說明]**，或在在指令碼窗格或主控台窗格的任何位置按下 F1 鍵 (但游標不可以在 Cmdlet 名稱上方)。

trans-unit.source: From the **Help** menu you can also run the Update\-Help cmdlet, and display the Command Window which assists you in constructing commands by showing you all of the parameters for a cmdlet and enabling you to fill in the parameters in an easy\-to\-use form.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以從 **[說明]** 功能表執行 Update-Help Cmdlet，並顯示命令視窗，透過顯示 Cmdlet 的所有參數並讓您在容易使用的表單中填入參數，來協助您建構命令。

trans-unit.source: See Also
Using the Windows PowerShell ISE
